poem:
### Shadows of the Net

Beneath the surface,  
men weave their dark web—  
a tapestry of stolen intimacies,  
faces unseen in the blur  
of networked desires.  
Hands reach through screens,  
partaking of the unconsenting,  
woven in threads of silence.  
Here, the echo of harm  
bristles against the light,  
a grim harvest of the unseen.
